item.title: ch.fhir.ig.ch-atc#3.1.0
item.description: The profile CH ATC defines the audit trail consumption requirements for the EPR in Switzerland which a community has to provide for a patients audit trail
item.dc:creator: eHealth Suisse

item.title: ch.fhir.ig.ch-orf#1.0.0
item.description: The Order & Referral by Form (CH ORF) Profile describes how forms for eReferrals, requests for information (such as diagnostic imaging results, lab results, discharge reports etc.) can be defined, deployed and used in order to achieve a syntactical and semantically consistent cross enterprise information exchange.
item.dc:creator: HL7 Switzerland
